alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Powell; Rockcastle; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 16 at 5:07PM EST until February 16 at 7:30PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Estill County in east central Kentucky... Southwestern Powell County in east central Kentucky... Northeastern Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... West Central Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... North Central Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 730 PM EST. * At 507 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated a line of thunderstorms producing heavy rain moving across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have already fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area with this line. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Irvine, Beattyville, McKee, Booneville, Fincastle, Ravenna, Old Orchard, Arvel, Banford, Leighton, Earnestville, Wind Cave, Evelyn, Yellow Rock, Willow Shoals, Wild Dog, Cressmont, Lakes, New Zion and Alumbaugh. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route. Report flooding to local law enforcement.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Clay; Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Powell; Rockcastle; Wolfe
